attributes.action: Listen to Meic Young's "the groove" on sixhits!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Meic Young is a youthful, talented individual who broadcasts a show on a station for no wages.  He is so good that he should certainly be on air at the BBC.  Mr Blair and the government should listen to this person and pressure the fat cats at places such as the BBC to show off this talent to the rest of the listening public.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
